thread.section_title: Live Feed Wire - Golf News Today - EIN Presswire
thread.title: NBC5 News at Noon

author: Michael Cusanelli
title: NBC5 News at Noon
text: Northern Lights: Viewers capture stunning photos over Vermont, New York Northern Lights: Viewers capture stunning photos over Vermont, New York Schroon Lake Katie Bowen of Schroon Lake sent in this classic-looking shot showing off greens, purples and pinks from the Northern Lights. PHOTO: Katie Bowen Paradox Lake NBC5 Meteorologist Matt DiLoreto captured this stunning scene from Paradox Lake, NY. PHOTO: Matt DiLoreto Crown Point Viewer Cody Lang sent this gorgeous unedited shot in from Crown Point, New York. PHOTO: Cody Lang Whiteface Mountain Whiteface Mountain in Wilmongton, NY also saw a brilliant display of lights, as shown in this still from a time-lapse video posted to the mountain's Facebook account. PHOTO: ORDA/Whiteface Mountain East Rygate Viewer Karen Santorello of East Rygate sent in this moody photo showing the northern lights shining down in her hometown. PHOTO: Karen Santorello Rutland Our NBC5 weather camera in Rutland caught a nice shot of green on the horizon over the city. PHOTO: NBC5 Schroon Lake Katie Bowen of Schroon Lake sent in this classic-looking shot showing off greens, purples and pinks from the Northern Lights. PHOTO: Katie Bowen Paradox Lake NBC5 Meteorologist Matt DiLoreto captured this stunning scene from Paradox Lake, NY. PHOTO: Matt DiLoreto Crown Point Viewer Cody Lang sent this gorgeous unedited shot in from Crown Point, New York. PHOTO: Cody Lang Whiteface Mountain Whiteface Mountain in Wilmongton, NY also saw a brilliant display of lights, as shown in this still from a time-lapse video posted to the mountain's Facebook account. PHOTO: ORDA/Whiteface Mountain East Rygate Viewer Karen Santorello of East Rygate sent in this moody photo showing the northern lights shining down in her hometown. PHOTO: Karen Santorello Rutland Our NBC5 weather camera in Rutland caught a nice shot of green on the horizon over the city. PHOTO: NBC5 Schroon Lake Katie Bowen of Schroon Lake sent in this classic-looking shot showing off greens, purples and pinks from the Northern Lights. PHOTO: Katie Bowen Paradox Lake NBC5 Meteorologist Matt DiLoreto captured this stunning scene from Paradox Lake, NY. PHOTO: Matt DiLoreto Crown Point Viewer Cody Lang sent this gorgeous unedited shot in from Crown Point, New York. PHOTO: Cody Lang Whiteface Mountain Whiteface Mountain in Wilmongton, NY also saw a brilliant display of lights, as shown in this still from a time-lapse video posted to the mountain's Facebook account. PHOTO: ORDA/Whiteface Mountain East Rygate Viewer Karen Santorello of East Rygate sent in this moody photo showing the northern lights shining down in her hometown. PHOTO: Karen Santorello Rutland Our NBC5 weather camera in Rutland caught a nice shot of green on the horizon over the city. PHOTO: NBC5 NBC5 viewers from across our region stayed up late on Thursday night to see a [spectacular showing of the Northern Lights](https://www.mynbc5.com/article/northern-lights-vermont-new-york-october/62569292), and many of them sent their best shots in after capturing dazzling displays in their own backyards. Check out some of our favorites below in the gallery.
